item.title: Bramble bush overhanging footpath, 28th July
item.description:
About halfway down this footpath behind the nature reserve there's a bramble bush overhanging the path, making it necessary to duck under it. Please could this be cut back? Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Banbury and Cheltenham Direct Railway, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Redundant sign post to be removed., 28th July
item.description:
A traffic restriction signpost has been placed outside 10 Market Street for over a year now, and sign has been removed but the post has not. Can you arrange for this post to be removed and the pavement made good.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Market Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Graffiti, 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Market Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Footpath…Old Lane Cottage, Norton Gloucester, 28th July
item.description:
Footpath blocked so cannot be used, should go through Old Lane Cottage & out the other side…people are trespassing by going around, needs sign & accessible gates. This has been reported before …
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A38, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zero Street Cleaning on Typhoon Way Coopers Edge, Brockworth, 28th July
item.description:
According to Gloucestershire County Council records Typhoon Road is an adopted highway, therefore street cleaning is a District Council statutory duty. As you will see from the attached photos this road has significant detritus and other rubbish - please arrange to clear it as soon as possible in accordance with Code of Practice on Litter and Refuse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Typhoon Way, Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet
